design.custom_css: /*HEADER*/ .toolbar .tabmenu { top: 0 !important; } div.toolbar-title.toolbar-title-ios, .toolbar-background-md { color: transparent !important; background-image: url(assets/logo2.png); background-size: 150px 30px !important; background-position: center center; background-repeat: no-repeat; height: 100%; } #favorites-toolbar .toolbar-background-md, #favorites-toolbar .toolbar-background-ios { background-image: none !important; } .toolbar-title-md { display:none; } /*HAMBURGER MENU*/ button.bar-buttons.bar-buttons-md.bar-button.bar-button-md.bar-button-default.bar-button-default-md.bar-button-menutoggle.bar-button-menutoggle-md, button.disable-hover.bar-buttons.bar-buttons-ios.bar-button.bar-button-ios.bar-button-default.bar-button-default-ios.bar-button-menutoggle.bar-button-menutoggle-ios { display: none; } /*TABBAR*/ .tabbar .tab-button { color: #999; opacity: 1; } .tabbar .tab-button[aria-selected=true], .tabbar .tab-button[aria-selected=true] .tab-button-icon { color: #333; opacity: 1; } /*SINGLE POST*/ .appp-posted-on, .appp-posted-on a, .appp-below-post, #content .featured-image, p.embed_download, a.post-edit-link, #vc_load-inline-editor.vc_inline-link { display: none !important; } .entry-content.padding { padding: 0 !important; } .entry-content h1, .entry-content p { padding: 25px 25px 10px 25px; margin:0; } iframe { margin: 0 !important; } img { width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 0 !important; padding: 0 !important; } /*EMBED ANY DOCUMENT*/ /*ANIMATECSS*/ a { -webkit-animation: zoomIn 0.4s; animation: zoomIn 0.4s; -webkit-animation-delay:0ms; animation-delay:0ms; } h1, h2, h3, h4, h5 { -webkit-animation: fadeInLeft 0.6s; animation: fadeInLeft 0.6s; -webkit-animation-delay:0ms; animation-delay:0ms; } p { -webkit-animation: fadeInLeft 0.8s; animation: fadeInLeft 0.8s; -webkit-animation-delay:0ms; animation-delay:0ms; } ion-header { -webkit-animation: fadeInDown 0.5s; animation: fadeInDown 0.5s; -webkit-animation-delay:0ms; animation-delay:0ms; } @-webkit-keyframes fadeInDown { from { opacity: 0; -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0); transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0); } to { opacity: 1; -webkit-transform: none; transform: none; } } @keyframes fadeInDown { from { opacity: 0; -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0); transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0); } to { opacity: 1; -webkit-transform: none; transform: none; } } .fadeInDown { -webkit-animation-name: fadeInDown; animation-name: fadeInDown; } /*REMOVE HEADER AND TAB ON LANDSCAPE*/ @media only screen and (orientation: landscape) { ion-header.header.header-md > *, ion-header.header.header-ios, div.tabbar.show-tabbar { display: none; } div.fixed-content, div.scroll-content { margin-top: 0 !important; margin-bottom: 0 !important; } } /*REMOVE HEADER ON FIRST TAB*/ ion-tab#tabpanel-t0-0.show-tab ion-header.header.header-md > *, ion-tab#tabpanel-t0-0.show-tab ion-header.header.header-ios { display: none; } /*VC GENERAL*/ .wpb_content_element { margin-bottom: 0; } /*VC ADVANCED BUTTON*/ span.ubtn-data.ubtn-text { font-size: 1.5rem; } .ubtn-ctn-center { margin-bottom: 0; }
